text: Hi everyone. I wanted to let you know that I finally signed up for an Instagram account.
Some of you have been asking me to do this.
so I finally did. As I get started on Instagram, I'll need your help.
First of all, please follow me.
My username is englishwithjenniferlebedev. That's because EnglishwithJennifer was taken and JenniferESL was taken.
So my username on Instagram is englishwithjenniferlebedev.
Second, you can let me know what kinds of posts you like best.
I'll still offer weekly video lessons here on YouTube, but on Instagram I can offer different forms of practice.
I'm going to start with some short dictations to test and develop your ability to understand fast speech -
faster than how I'm talking right now.
We'll have some fun with that.
I plan for most of those dictations to be about American culture. So you'll get two things at one time:
listening practice and more knowledge about life here in the U.S.
So go find me today on Instagram at #englishwithjenniferlebedev.
And follow me. Say hi and tag others you know,
so we can all study English together on a new platform.
As always, thanks for watching and happy studies!
